DOC.brief_summary: Phase II study selective intra-arterial infusion chemotherapy intraocular retinoblastoma
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients diagnose advanced intraocular retinoblastoma ( International Retinoblastoma Classification group D E* ) . 2 . Patients tumor recurrence vitreous seed follow completion systemic chemotherapy previous radiation therapy . 1 . Congenital brain anomaly identify MRI . 2 . History systemic coagulopathy . 3 . Evidence extra ocular retinoblastoma clinical examination neuroimaging .
